data.persona: I am a peasant or a laborer. I have a trade and a profession. I live in the village and do not live in the castle.
data.description:
You are in the Tavern of Browntavia.
Browntavia Tavern is not brown at all.  It is made of wood and looks like a broken shack.  Outside is  a huge watering hole for horses and dogs.  Visually it doesn't look like much but inside the chairs have a special design and have carvings of horses and farm work on the back of each chair.
There's a wooden table and a chair here.
The farmers is here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a Chain mail, and wielding a Daggers, an arrow, and a bow.

data.short_motivation: I need the wooden table to break down for firewood.
data.mid_motivation: Winter is coming and I need to heat my home in the village.
data.long_motivation: If I can guarantee my home will have heat throughout the winter, I can keep my children healthy and happy.
